price: Saa nkorͻfoͻ yi na εyε, anaasε Tubbafoͻ no, ne wͻn a wͻdii wͻn anim kan noa? Yεsεee wͻn (nyinaa) efirisε nokorε, na wͻyε abͻneεfoͻ.
arabic: أَهُمۡ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ قَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ahum khayrun am qawmu tubbaʿin wa-alladhīna min qablihim ahlaknāhum innahum kānū muj'rimīna
